lead_paragraph: The right-hander Kris Benson, the first pick in the 1996 draft by the Pittsburgh Pirates, signed a minor league contract with the Texas Rangers. Benson reported to camp as a nonroster invitee. Benson, 34, last pitched in the majors in 2006, going 11-12 with a 4.82 earned run average for Baltimore. He has a career record of 68-73 with a 4.34 E.R.A. with the Pirates, Orioles and Mets. He missed the 2007 season after having surgery to repair a torn right rotator cuff.
